column2:
"Hello~! Summer is here! What does
summer reminds you of... that's right!
It's summer resort!"

"The venue this time is the Coast so I am
thinking of making a resort that can be
enjoyed by everyone! "

"So for that purpose...
firstly, the safety of the venue must be
secured!"

"I'm sure you are fine!
Please help us again!"

"やっほー！　夏がやってきたよ！
夏といえば……そう！
サマーリゾートだよね！"

"今回も会場は海岸で、みんなが
楽しめるリゾートを作ろうと思います！"

"と、いうわけで……
まずは会場の安全確保から！"

"貴方なら大丈夫だよね！
お願いしまーすっ！"
